fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks
eu_initiatives:
-EU space policy: Through many events space policy is analysed and proposals for improving its efficiency. 
-Youth employment: Main activity of our association. Special events (such as career days and meetings with industry) are organised so that industry creates more working places for young engineers.  
-Adoption of the list of skills, competences and occupations of the classification for matching on the EURES portal: Many events (such as career days and speeches) where professionals explain how skills and competences match with job roles mostly referring to EURES portal.   
-Technical standards and formats for matching of vacancies and job seeker profiles on the EURES portal: Many events (such as career days and speeches) where professionals explain how standards and formats match with job roles mostly referring to EURES portal.
organisation_name: ALUMNI of the EUROPEAN ASSOCIATION OF AEROSPACE STUDENTS (EUROAVIA ALUMNI)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
Mentoring in Euroavians 
Events such us speeches, workshops and career days for Promoting Space awareness, networking with industry and Universities.
